4e24c913ceffb54cc97e0ee89bcd31cf43","dweb:/ipfs/QmUZ2jsGxb818X9DZBvXzT9SXbw8ASk3QwYXtPfkwNCB9M"]},"contracts/interfaces/IDegenerusJackpots.sol":{"keccak256":"0xcabbdec4f6b515c482e4106bc8e6ee1924e827750ea4d2ea82f633df875d2856","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://6eb731745962fe9894a44a23f3529e73a285a21fdaca4bc1b81e45afe1d81507","dweb:/ipfs/QmcZdp6aYJ9bofWJd5miYXivTy5rFcPzp5PzpyCxwUG7tA"]}},"version":1}

claimDecimatorJackpot(uint24).details: Public function for players to claim their own jackpot.      Credits payout to player's claimable balance via game contract.

claimDecimatorJackpotBatch(address[],uin.details: Permissionless: anyone can trigger claims for others.      Gas-efficient for processing multiple claims at once.

params.players: Array of player addresses to claim for.

consumeDecClaim(address,uint24).details: Access: game contract only. Used for game-initiated claims.

decClaimable(address,uint24).details: View function for UI to show claimable amounts.

returns.amountWei: Claimable amount (0 if not winner or already claimed).
returns.winner: True if player is a winner for this level.

recordBafFlip(address,uint24,uint256).details: Access: coin contract only. Called on every manual coinflip.      - Accumulates per BAF bracket level      - Weights the flip amount by player's bonus multiplier (in bps)      - Updates top-4 leaderboard for the level

recordDecBurn(address,uint24,uint8,uint2.details: Access: coin contract only. Called on every Decimator burn.      - First burn locks player's bucket (denominator) choice      - Subbucket is deterministically assigned from hash      - Subsequent burns in same level accumulate in locked bucket      - Burn amount capped at uint192.max (saturating)

params.baseAmount: Burn amount before multiplier (includes quest rewards).

returns.bucketUsed: The bucket actually used (may differ if already locked).

runBafJackpot(uint256,uint24,uint256).details: Access: game contract only. Called at level end.      Distributes poolWei across multiple winner categories with eligibility checks.      Returns arrays of winners/amounts plus bondMask for special handling.

params.poolWei: Total ETH prize pool for distribution.

returns.amounts: Array of prize amounts corresponding to winners.
returns.bondMask: Bitmask indicating which winners get special bond/map treatment.
returns.returnAmountWei: Unawarded prize amount to return to caller.

runDecimatorJackpot(uint256,uint24,uint2.details: Access: game contract only. Called at level end.      Selects winning subbucket per denominator and snapshots totals.      Actual distribution happens via claim functions.

params.poolWei: Total ETH prize pool for this level.

returns.returnAmountWei: Amount to return (non-zero if no winners or already snapshotted).

claimDecimatorJackpotBatch(address[],uin.notice: Batch claim Decimator jackpots for multiple players.

consumeDecClaim(address,uint24).notice: Consume Decimator claim on behalf of player.

decClaimable(address,uint24).notice: Check if player can claim Decimator jackpot for a level.

recordBafFlip(address,uint24,uint256).notice: Record a coinflip stake for BAF leaderboard tracking.

recordDecBurn(address,uint24,uint8,uint2.notice: Record a Decimator burn for jackpot eligibility.

runBafJackpot(uint256,uint24,uint256).notice: Resolve the BAF jackpot for a level.

runDecimatorJackpot(uint256,uint24,uint2.notice: Snapshot Decimator jackpot winners for deferred claims.
